Mike Foley wrote:

> So all the various assert methods all return void. How would I go
> about getting a boolean telling me the result of an assert? I need to
> do something with this information.

assert*() either throws an exception or doesn't. That's exactly the same 
as returning true or false, except that if it returns false, it 
automatically ends the test. You should be able to do what you need, anyway.
